Welcome to my portfolio website, it was created to expose the projects that I was legally entitled to post in my portfolio as either my Own projects or as freelance projects, I've worked for many companies around the world, and I have learned many technologies and languages, one of the companies I'm working recently is working with angular, so I decided to extrapolate a few of my knowledge in design patterns from AS3 to JavaScript, and I have to say, angular is easy, and the learning curve is almost a straight line.

This portfolio was created using npm, bower, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, AngularJS, JavaScript, jQuery, jade (pug), gulp (and its many plugins).

Of course that so many technologies may look like an overkill but, it was done in 2 days, angular made that possible.

So you can see this angular portfolio at github
